      • getINSTANCE

        public static GoogleMapsAPIService getINSTANCE()

      • requestData

        public java.lang.String requestData(java.lang.String origin,
                                    java.lang.String destination)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.net.URISyntaxException
        This method requests data from Google Maps Distance Matrix.

        Creates url in order to send the original raw data, that the application receives, to GMDM.

        Parameters:
        origin - Raw origin address.
        destination - Raw destination address.
        Returns:
        String, generated by the execute method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.net.URISyntaxException

      • extractData

        public org.json.JSONObject extractData(spark.Response res,
                                       java.lang.String rawData)
        Extracting the data received from Google Maps Distance Matrix.

        This method creates JSONObject from the raw string (from the return value of requestData). It also checks and returns possible status errors of the API.

        Parameters:
        res -
        rawData - Raw, unformatted GMDM response string.
        Returns:
        JSONObject, either an error message or raw shipping info.

      • generateErrorJson

        public org.json.JSONObject generateErrorJson(spark.Response response,
                                             int statusCode,
                                             java.lang.String message)
        For generating JSON formatted status error messages.
        Parameters:
        response -
        statusCode - Description custom status error code.
        message - Description status error message.
        Returns:
        Description status error in JSON format.
